overview: Bülent is the clumsy son of a wealthy family. Besides, a lot of money is spent on him so that he is not reproached for this ineptitude. His father allows Bülent a month to end this: He will either change his ways or be cut off without a cent! While Bülent finds love in the runaway bride Esma, after all kinds of adventures on this quest, Esma's brother Davut is after them for the sake of honor.
title: Organik Love
